About Me

Hi, my name is Lalith and I’m a Desktop Platoform Engineer working at Bank of New Zealand (BNZ Auckland). As well as administrating systems I also have experience and knowledge in SCCM, PowerShell, Office 365 and Azure. I have worked at a number of companies gaining teamwork and leadership skills.

I am most skilled in: Office 365, Windows Server and Windows desktop ecosystem
